name_xml: Bar Aspect Ratio Study Sliced By Space Type Office
modeler_description: Instead of taking a hash of space type names and fractions, this has a double argument for each standards space type for an Office. This is intended to be used in a model where only one space type exists for each standards space type field. If there are multiple possible space types you may not get the expected results.
description: This measure will create a building envelope based on a target floor area, aspect ratio, floor to floor height, and a collection of space types and fraction of building using that space type.
